attributes.action: petition to get sex attack laws on aminials changed to include more than just penetration with a penis
attributes.additional_details: as stated above this is a petition to have the laws on animial violation looked at again currently, the law states that sexual violation has only happened if a person use a penis to penetrate a animial or allows a penis to penetrate them, so apparently its ok in the eyes of the law to do other things to a animial involving penetration so long as it is not a penis this is worng so so worng
